checks.name: Schema Check
checks.definition:
checks for customer_dimension:
  - schema:
      fail:
        when mismatching columns:
          customer_key: Integer
          customer_type: Varchar
          customer_name: Varchar
          customer_gender: Varchar
          title: Varchar
          household_id: Integer
          customer_address: Varchar
          customer_city: Varchar
          customer_state: Char
          customer_region: Varchar
          marital_status: Varchar
          customer_age: Integer
          number_of_children: Integer
          annual_income: Integer
          occupation: Varchar
          largest_bill_amount: Integer
          store_membership_card: Integer
          customer_since: Date
          deal_stage: Varchar
          deal_size: Integer
          last_deal_update: Date

blocks.title: Schema

queries.name: vertica_local.customer_dimension.aggregation[0]
queries.sql:
SELECT 
  COUNT(CASE WHEN customer_key IS NULL THEN 1 END) 
FROM public.customer_dimension

queries.name: vertica_local.customer_dimension.schema[customer_dimension]
queries.sql:
select
  columns.column_name
  , types.type_name as data_type
  , columns.is_nullable
from columns
  inner join types
      on columns.data_type_id = types.type_id
where table_name = 'customer_dimension' 
  and table_schema = 'public'

order by ordinal_position
